create or replace PACKAGE lm_ste_tapi_pck
IS
-- Table API package for table lm_station_types
-- Generated by VI TAPI generator version 6.2  (TAPI generated 03-Jan-2022  05:41:18)

-- Generated global constants
g_con_pack        CONSTANT     VARCHAR2(30) := 'LM_STE_TAPI_PCK';
g_con_table_name  CONSTANT     VARCHAR2(61) := 'LM_STATION_TYPES';
g_lock_conflicts  PLS_INTEGER := 0;


FUNCTION ste_select_row( i_ste_ID   IN  lm_station_types.ID%TYPE
                       , o_rt_ste   OUT lm_station_types%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION ste_select_row_uk1( i_ste_NAME   IN  lm_station_types.NAME%TYPE
                           , o_rt_ste  OUT lm_station_types%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION ste_select_row_uk2( i_ste_DESCRIPTION   IN  lm_station_types.DESCRIPTION%TYPE
                           , o_rt_ste  OUT lm_station_types%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION ste_select_row_upd( i_ste_ID   IN  lm_station_types.ID%TYPE
                           , o_rt_ste   OUT lm_station_types%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION ste_select_row_upd_uk1( i_ste_NAME   IN  lm_station_types.NAME%TYPE
                               , o_rt_ste  OUT lm_station_types%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION ste_select_row_upd_uk2( i_ste_DESCRIPTION   IN  lm_station_types.DESCRIPTION%TYPE
                               , o_rt_ste  OUT lm_station_types%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

PROCEDURE ste_lock_row( i_ste_ID   IN  lm_station_types.ID%TYPE )
;

PROCEDURE ste_lock_row_nowait( i_ste_ID   IN  lm_station_types.ID%TYPE )
;

PROCEDURE ste_insert_row ( io_rt_ste  IN OUT lm_station_types%ROWTYPE )
;

FUNCTION ste_update_row( i_ste_ID   IN     lm_station_types.ID%TYPE
                       , io_rt_ste  IN OUT lm_station_types%ROWTYPE )
RETURN NUMBER
;

FUNCTION ste_delete_row( i_ste_ID   IN  lm_station_types.ID%TYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;


END lm_ste_tapi_pck;
/




package body lm_ste_tapi_pck
is




function ste_select_row( i_ste_id   in  lm_station_types.id%type
                       , o_rt_ste   out lm_station_types%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ste_select_row';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_ste ( i_ste_id   in  lm_station_types.id%type )
      is 
           select *
             from lm_station_types ste
            where ste.id = i_ste_id ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_ste( i_ste_id => i_ste_id );
         fetch c_ste into o_rt_ste;
         l_found := c_ste%found;
         close c_ste;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc 
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_ste%isopen
         then
            close c_ste;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end ste_select_row;

   l_found                boolean      := false;

   declare
      cursor c_ste ( i_ste_name   in  lm_station_types.name%type )
      is
         select *
           from lm_station_types ste
          where ste.name = i_ste_name ;

      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_ste(i_ste_name => i_ste_name);
         fetch c_ste into o_rt_ste;
         l_found := c_ste%found;
         close c_ste;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
   when others
    then
      if c_ste%isopen
      then
         close c_ste;
      end if;
      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end ste_select_row_uk1;

           from lm_station_types ste
          where ste.description = i_ste_description ;

         fetch c_ste into o_rt_ste;
         l_found := c_ste%found;
         close c_ste;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
   when others
    then
      if c_ste%isopen
      then
         close c_ste;
      end if;
      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end ste_select_row_uk2;

function ste_select_row_upd( i_ste_id   in  lm_station_types.id%type
                           , o_rt_ste   out lm_station_types%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ste_select_row_upd';
   l_found                boolean      := false;

   cursor c_ste ( i_ste_id   in  lm_station_types.id%type )
   is
           select *
             from lm_station_types ste
            where ste.id = i_ste_id 
         for update;
begin
   viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

   
   open c_ste( i_ste_id => i_ste_id );
   fetch c_ste into o_rt_ste;
   l_found := c_ste%found;
   close c_ste;

   viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                          , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

   return l_found;

exception
   when others
   then
      if c_ste%isopen
      then
         close c_ste;
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );

end ste_select_row_upd;

function ste_select_row_upd_uk1( i_ste_name   in  lm_station_types.name%type
                               , o_rt_ste  out lm_station_types%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ste_select_row_upd_uk1';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   begin
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      
      l_found := ste_select_row_uk1( i_ste_name   =>  i_ste_name
                                   , o_rt_ste => o_rt_ste );
      if l_found
      then
         
         l_found := ste_select_row_upd( i_ste_id => o_rt_ste.id
                                      , o_rt_ste => o_rt_ste );
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

        viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc);
   end;
end ste_select_row_upd_uk1;

      if l_found

                                      , o_rt_ste => o_rt_ste );
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then

        viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc);
   end;
end ste_select_row_upd_uk2;

procedure ste_lock_row( i_ste_id   in  lm_station_types.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ste_lock_row';
begin
  declare
     cursor c_ste ( i_ste_id   in  lm_station_types.id%type )
     is
             select ''
               from lm_station_types ste
              where ste.id = i_ste_id 
         for update;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         
         if i_ste_id is not null
         then
            begin
                
                ste_lock_row_nowait( i_ste_id => i_ste_id );
            exception
               when viu_constant.exc_lockfailed
               then
                  
                  g_lock_conflicts := g_lock_conflicts + 1;

                  
                  viu_info.reset_package_variables;

                  
                  open c_ste( i_ste_id => i_ste_id );
                  close c_ste;
               end;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_ste%isopen
         then
            close c_ste;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end ste_lock_row;

procedure ste_lock_row_nowait( i_ste_id   in  lm_station_types.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ste_lock_row_nowait';
begin
   declare
      cursor c_ste ( i_ste_id   in  lm_station_types.id%type )
      is
              select ''
                from lm_station_types ste
               where ste.id = i_ste_id 
          for update nowait;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin

         
         if i_ste_id is not null
         then
            
            open c_ste( i_ste_id => i_ste_id );

            close c_ste;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
        if c_ste%isopen
        then
           close c_ste;
        end if;

        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

        viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_lockfailed
                           , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                           , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                           , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                           , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_ste_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end ste_lock_row_nowait;

function ste_perform_update( i_ste_id   in     lm_station_types.id%type
                           , io_rt_ste  in out lm_station_types%rowtype )
return number
;

function ste_perform_delete( i_ste_id   in  lm_station_types.id%type )
return boolean
;

procedure ste_insert_row ( io_rt_ste  in out lm_station_types%rowtype )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ste_insert_row';
begin
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      
      begin
         insert into lm_station_types( id
                                , name
                                , description
                                , conduct_type
                                , ind_use_oper_state_for_avlblty
                                , maximum_capacity
                                , target_release_rate
                                , interval_lrt_normal
                                , interval_lrt_priority )
              values ( io_rt_ste.id
                     , io_rt_ste.name
                     , io_rt_ste.description
                     , io_rt_ste.conduct_type
                     , io_rt_ste.ind_use_oper_state_for_avlblty
                     , io_rt_ste.maximum_capacity
                     , io_rt_ste.target_release_rate
                     , io_rt_ste.interval_lrt_normal
                     , io_rt_ste.interval_lrt_priority )
           returning id
                   , name
                   , description
                   , conduct_type
                   , ind_use_oper_state_for_avlblty
                   , maximum_capacity
                   , target_release_rate
                   , interval_lrt_normal
                   , interval_lrt_priority
                into io_rt_ste.id
                   , io_rt_ste.name
                   , io_rt_ste.description
                   , io_rt_ste.conduct_type
                   , io_rt_ste.ind_use_oper_state_for_avlblty
                   , io_rt_ste.maximum_capacity
                   , io_rt_ste.target_release_rate
                   , io_rt_ste.interval_lrt_normal
                   , io_rt_ste.interval_lrt_priority;

      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_insertfailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_ste.id||'"'
                                                             ||', NAME = "'||io_rt_ste.name||'"'
                                                             ||', DESCRIPTION = "'||io_rt_ste.description||'"'
                                                             ||', CONDUCT_TYPE = "'||io_rt_ste.conduct_type||'"'
                                                             ||', IND_USE_OPER_STATE_FOR_AVLBLTY = "'||io_rt_ste.ind_use_oper_state_for_avlblty||'"'
                                                             ||', MAXIMUM_CAPACITY = "'||io_rt_ste.maximum_capacity||'"'
                                                             ||', TARGET_RELEASE_RATE = "'||io_rt_ste.target_release_rate||'"'
                                                             ||', INTERVAL_LRT_NORMAL = "'||io_rt_ste.interval_lrt_normal||'"'
                                                             ||', INTERVAL_LRT_PRIORITY = "'||io_rt_ste.interval_lrt_priority||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end ste_insert_row;

function ste_perform_update( i_ste_id   in     lm_station_types.id%type
                           , io_rt_ste  in out lm_station_types%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ste_perform_update';
begin
   
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         update lm_station_types
            set id = io_rt_ste.id
              , name = io_rt_ste.name
              , description = io_rt_ste.description
              , conduct_type = io_rt_ste.conduct_type
              , ind_use_oper_state_for_avlblty = io_rt_ste.ind_use_oper_state_for_avlblty
              , maximum_capacity = io_rt_ste.maximum_capacity
              , target_release_rate = io_rt_ste.target_release_rate
              , interval_lrt_normal = io_rt_ste.interval_lrt_normal
              , interval_lrt_priority = io_rt_ste.interval_lrt_priority
          where id = i_ste_id
      returning id
              , name
              , description
              , conduct_type
              , ind_use_oper_state_for_avlblty
              , maximum_capacity
              , target_release_rate
              , interval_lrt_normal
              , interval_lrt_priority
           into io_rt_ste.id
              , io_rt_ste.name
              , io_rt_ste.description
              , io_rt_ste.conduct_type
              , io_rt_ste.ind_use_oper_state_for_avlblty
              , io_rt_ste.maximum_capacity
              , io_rt_ste.target_release_rate
              , io_rt_ste.interval_lrt_normal
              , io_rt_ste.interval_lrt_priority;

         l_rowcount := sql%rowcount;
      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_ste.id||'"'
                                                             ||', NAME = "'||io_rt_ste.name||'"'
                                                             ||', DESCRIPTION = "'||io_rt_ste.description||'"'
                                                             ||', CONDUCT_TYPE = "'||io_rt_ste.conduct_type||'"'
                                                             ||', IND_USE_OPER_STATE_FOR_AVLBLTY = "'||io_rt_ste.ind_use_oper_state_for_avlblty||'"'
                                                             ||', MAXIMUM_CAPACITY = "'||io_rt_ste.maximum_capacity||'"'
                                                             ||', TARGET_RELEASE_RATE = "'||io_rt_ste.target_release_rate||'"'
                                                             ||', INTERVAL_LRT_NORMAL = "'||io_rt_ste.interval_lrt_normal||'"'
                                                             ||', INTERVAL_LRT_PRIORITY = "'||io_rt_ste.interval_lrt_priority||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount)||' rows updated' );

      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end ste_perform_update;

function ste_perform_delete( i_ste_id   in  lm_station_types.id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ste_perform_delete';
begin
   
   declare
      l_found  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         delete
           from lm_station_types
          where id = i_ste_id;

         l_found := sql%found;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );
      return l_found;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_ste_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end ste_perform_delete;

function ste_update_row( i_ste_id   in     lm_station_types.id%type
                       , io_rt_ste  in out lm_station_types%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ste_update_row';
begin
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         ste_lock_row( i_ste_id   =>  i_ste_id );

         
         l_rowcount := 
            ste_perform_update( i_ste_id   =>  i_ste_id
                              , io_rt_ste  => io_rt_ste );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount) ||' rows updated');
      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_ste.id||'"'
                                                          ||', NAME = "'||io_rt_ste.name||'"'
                                                          ||', DESCRIPTION = "'||io_rt_ste.description||'"'
                                                          ||', CONDUCT_TYPE = "'||io_rt_ste.conduct_type||'"'
                                                          ||', IND_USE_OPER_STATE_FOR_AVLBLTY = "'||io_rt_ste.ind_use_oper_state_for_avlblty||'"'
                                                          ||', MAXIMUM_CAPACITY = "'||io_rt_ste.maximum_capacity||'"'
                                                          ||', TARGET_RELEASE_RATE = "'||io_rt_ste.target_release_rate||'"'
                                                          ||', INTERVAL_LRT_NORMAL = "'||io_rt_ste.interval_lrt_normal||'"'
                                                          ||', INTERVAL_LRT_PRIORITY = "'||io_rt_ste.interval_lrt_priority||'"'                                                           , 1, 4000));
   end;                                                          
end ste_update_row;

function ste_delete_row( i_ste_id   in  lm_station_types.id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ste_delete_row';
begin
   declare
      l_deleted  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         ste_lock_row( i_ste_id   =>  i_ste_id );

         
         l_deleted := ste_perform_delete( i_ste_id   =>  i_ste_id );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

      return l_deleted;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_ste_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end ste_delete_row;


end lm_ste_tapi_pck;
/
